snippet: The parents of an U.S. aid worker held hostage by Islamic State militants on Sunday released photographs of their son and parts of a letter he wrote them from captivity in which he says he is scared to die but at peace with his belief....

headline.print_headline: Parents of American Held by Islamic State Release Photos, Letter
headline.main: Parents of American Held by Islamic State Release Photos, Letter

lead_paragraph: The parents of an U.S. aid worker held hostage by Islamic State militants on Sunday released photographs of their son and parts of a letter he wrote them from captivity in which he says he is scared to die but at peace with his belief.
